name: Ecstasy / Light / Inertia
description:
Please Note: "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia" - An Experimental Gamified Experience

We are delighted to share "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia" with the Steam community. This title offers a unique, experimental gamified experience, exploring themes drawn from art, philosophy, and the breathtaking beauty of the Nordic landscape.

Designed as a short, immersive journey, the gameplay typically lasts between 25 to 45 minutes. Given the experimental and brief nature of this project, it intentionally does not feature pause or save/load functions. This decision is part of our aim to deliver an uninterrupted, immersive experience that is best enjoyed in a single sitting.

We recommend that players ensure they have the necessary amount of uninterrupted time to fully engage with and explore the rich tapestry of ideas and influences within "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia". Thank you for your understanding, and we hope you enjoy this artistic endeavor. Happy gaming!

Brief Overview:
"Ecstasy / Light / Inertia" is a short transcendent journey into the realm of new music and gamified exploration. This ground-breaking project artfully combines the immersive appeal of a 3D environment with narrative-based interaction, offering a fresh take on how we engage with music and sound art. As Luz, you'll embark on a hero's journey through beautifully crafted virtual spaces, enriched by the conceptual elements of the original music compositions woven into the experience.

Detailed Description:
From the comforting confines of Luz's apartment to the mystical landscapes of Nordic nature and the modernist architecture-inspired spaces, every corner of the game is meticulously designed and situated within the Unreal Game Engine. You'll navigate Luz's journey across a prologue, three chapters, and an epilogue, each presenting unique challenges that further her character development and your connection with the music.

In "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia", the familiar concert settings or sound art galleries are replaced by a comprehensive virtual experience. The music is not merely a backdrop; it forms the very fabric of Luz's quest, integrating seamlessly with each narrative progression. This game redefines the boundaries of traditional music enjoyment, taking you on a riveting journey through Luz's memories, challenges, and ultimate transformation, offering you an aesthetically rich, philosophically profound, and interactive experience.

Key Features:
  • Narrative-Based Interaction: Engage with an intricate storyline that follows Luz's hero's journey across beautifully crafted virtual spaces.

  • Original Music Compositions: Experience new music woven seamlessly into the narrative, crafted by an award-winning contemporary music composer.

  • Stunning 3D Environments: Traverse beautifully designed environments created using high-quality 3D scans and situated within the Unreal Game Engine.

  • Postmodern Philosophy and Aesthetics: Delve into profound philosophical themes, reflecting on human nature, memory, and the transformative power of music.

  • Free-to-use Experience: Enjoy this transdisciplinary project free of charge, helping democratize the accessibility of innovative, sound-focused art forms.

  • HRTF Audio Technology: Experience cutting-edge HRTF audio technology that amplifies the game's immersive qualities.

Whether you are an ardent music lover, an enthusiast of narrative-driven games, a philosophy explorer, or someone looking for a unique and immersive virtual experience, "Ecstasy / Light / Inertia" is the journey you wouldn't want to miss. Embark on Luz's journey today, and be a part of this new form to perceive and engage with music.
